question: What is the average number of boarding passes issued per flight?
query:
SELECT AVG(boarding_pass_count) AS avg_boarding_passes_per_flight
FROM (
    SELECT f.flight_id, COUNT(bp.pass_id) AS boarding_pass_count
    FROM postgres_air.flight f
    JOIN postgres_air.booking_leg bl ON f.flight_id = bl.flight_id
    JOIN postgres_air.boarding_pass bp ON bl.booking_leg_id = bp.booking_leg_id
    GROUP BY f.flight_id
);
